alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 03 at 7:56PM CST until February 08 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting Greene, Perry and George Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain, New Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT TO LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Leaf Near Mclain. * WHEN...From late Sunday night to late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Considerable flooding of agricultural and lowlands near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Thursday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday morning to a crest of 18.5 feet Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
